_header: Now well may me mirths make
_description: A macaronic Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) with Latin caudae and burden (b): Letabundus exultet fidelys chorus Alleluia

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Now wel may we merthis makeffor vs ihesu man hode hath
                    takeonly for our synnes sakeAlleluya…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…So childede þe maide with oute wemPari
                    forma

Bridgewater.First Lines:
Now well may we myrthys makeFor Ihesu mankynd hath
                    take…
Bridgewater.Last Lines:
…Oute of the wych commyghth a mervelose stremeSo dud þat
                    mayde wiþowtyn wemePari forma
Bridgewater.Note: On the back of a parchment indenture.
Bridgewater.Attributed Title:
Holy holy holy holy holy & yffy yffy (head); Holy holy & yfy yffy
                    holy yffy Holi (end)
